name: NatchoCalypse
description:
You have 60 seconds to save the world from a natcho-shaped giant rock! Use items to make yourself closer to the goal, an Giant Red Button that's in the end of the map.

Share your time in the community tab to show everyone how fast you are!

Game made for Brackeys game jam 2021

(I found out that natcho don't have a T in it, ok, not changing now...) 

thx for playing :)
